title: How can I gain access to the practice tool on the PBE?
body: I want to test some things out and am wondering how to gain access to the PBE

replies.body: PBE access isn't guaranteed to happen right away, but you can submit an [application](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  I appreciate your wanted to help out!  Good luck!  :D
I think you should add you can submit an application and wait a year and a half, still not be accepted, while your friend gets accepted on 7 accounts.
